Who you are: We are always looking for amazing talent who can contribute to our growth and deliver results! Geotab is seeking a Product Management Operations Intern who will support data analysis, mastering key tools, leveraging consumer insights, performing product testing, and assisting with documentation. If you love technology, and are keen to join an industry leader - we would love to hear from you! What you'll do: As a Product Management Operations Intern your key area of responsibility will be assisting the Product Operations Manager to enhance product operations. This includes: • Performing initial data analysis using tools such as Jira, Aha!, GetFeedback, and Walkme, contributing to research recruitment, and extracting valuable insights from customers' feedback and internal meetings. • You'll also be involved in conducting UAT tests under the guidance of the product operations manager, gaining hands-on exposure to Geotab's product suite, features, and functionalities. • You may be required to assist in documentation and other supportive tasks as required. • You will need to work closely with several of Geotab's departments, including Product Management, Development, Marketing and others. This cross-functional collaboration will let you gain valuable insights and experience, playing a key role in facilitating effective product operations within Geotab. To be successful in this role you must have: • Good communication, organization, and time management skills, as well as a willingness to learn and strong work ethic, passion for technology and innovation. • In addition, the successful candidate will have familiarity with the principles of supply chain management, knowledge of business strategies, and understanding of market trends is desirable. • Attention to detail is also essential. The opportunity: • 12 months work-term length beginning May, 2026. • Full-time, paid internship (Monday - Friday, 37.5hrs/week) • Your first week at Geotab begins with 'GEO Launch' - a one week Employee Orientation.
